text: "No Excuses" is a 1994 song by Alice in Chains. It is the leading single from their 1994 EP Jar of Hearts. It went to number 17 in Canada, number 48 on the Hot 100 Airplay and number 1 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1994 songs Category:Alice in Chains songs Category:Acoustic rock songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Jangle pop songs
title: No Excuses (Alice in Chains song)
